plot: Sole, Mari Pili and Marta are three girls that share an apartment in the pre-Olympic Barcelona. They decide to play a game: avoid all the preambles to the manhunt and have an affair with the first man that asks you your name.
title: Què t'hi jugues, Mari Pili?
plot_es: Sole, Mari Pili and Marta are three girls that share an apartment in the pre-Olympic Barcelona. They decide to play a game: avoid all the preambles to the manhunt and have an affair with the first man that asks you your name.
plot_en: Sole, Mari Pili and Marta are three girls that share an apartment in the pre-Olympic Barcelona. They decide to play a game: avoid all the preambles to the manhunt and have an affair with the first man that asks you your name.

produce.name: Els Films de la Rambla S.A.
